SELECT inventoryId, productName, stashName, supplierName, quantity, lastStockTime FROM tb_inventory WHERE 1=1
AND inventoryId = #{inventoryId}

SELECT inventoryId, productName, stashName, supplierName, quantity, lastStockTime FROM tb_inventory WHERE 1=1 AND productName = #{productName} AND stashName = #{stashName} AND supplierName = #{supplierName} ORDER BY lastStockTime DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM tb_inventory WHERE 1=1
AND productName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productName}, '%') AND stashName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{stashName}, '%') AND supplierName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{supplierName}, '%') ORDER BY lastStockTime DESC

SELECT * FROM tb_inventory_log WHERE 1=1
AND productName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productName}, '%') AND stashName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{stashName}, '%') AND supplierName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{supplierName}, '%') AND type = #{type} ORDER BY lastStockTime DESC
